title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile with Three Trees"
medium: Brush and brown watercolor, graphite on tracing paper
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: A sketch of three trees:  one to the left of sheet and two to right, drawn over vertical and horizontal grid lines (in the lower half of sheet) roughly one inch apart.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile with Three Trees".
Brush and brown watercolor, graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-100.
